solution_line_template: There are {tiles_width} tiles along the width and {tiles_height} tiles along the height for a total of {tiles_width}*{tiles_height} = <<{tiles_width}*{tiles_height}={tiles_per_wall}>>{tiles_per_wall} tiles
Each wall has {tiles_per_wall} tiles and there are {num_walls} walls so there are {tiles_per_wall}*{num_walls} = <<{tiles_per_wall}*{num_walls}={total_tiles}>>{total_tiles} tiles in the shower
